metadata.name: The Wonderful Niagara Falls US & Canada Border
metadata.description:
I remember seeing this back in the Philippines, I told my Canadian Trainer (She came to Manila to train me for a new role) "If I’ll be able to step into Canada’s soil. I’ll definitely visit this place!" A couple of years later, this became my family’s favourite place for short, quick trips.

You’ll rarely find a site as breathtaking and majestic as Niagara Falls! Located in a strait between Lake Ontario and Lake Erie, and shared by the United States and Canada, the Falls have become a popular vacation spot for tourist. You can view the Falls year round from observation points on both the American and Canadian sides of the Niagara River. 

A visit to Niagara Falls Canada on a summer night will reveal a dazzling display of lights and fireworks. Day and Night, the roar of the Falls and the gently cool mist impresses everyone. This gives tourist an amazing, breathtaking and majestic experience.
